vars.label: Fixed Width
vars.description: Set a fixed column width or expand it to its content's width. The other column(s) will automatically fill the remaining space.
Set the grid gutter width and display dividers between grid cells.

vars.label: Max Width
vars.description: Set the maximum content width. Note: The section may already have a maximum width, which you cannot exceed.

vars.label: Remove bottom margin
vars.description: Set the vertical margin. Note: The first grid's top margin and the last grid's bottom margin are always removed. Define those in the section settings instead.

vars.label: Match Height
vars.description: If only one panel element is published inside a column, expand its height to match larger columns.

vars.label: Breakpoint
vars.description: Set the breakpoint from which grid cells will stack.

vars.label: Order
vars.description: Change the visual order for the last item of the grid. This only applies to the selected breakpoint. When stacked, items will appear in the same order as they do in the source code.

vars.label: ID
vars.description: Define a unique identifier for the element.

vars.label: Class
vars.description: Define one or more class names for the element. Separate multiple classes with spaces.
